message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you still get a good share.
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
You didn't quite meet me in the middle, let's try this again.
Time is running out, this is my final offer!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Try again.
Okay, Alice, let's be real.  This is as close to even as it's going to get.
